content: The information shown is just the name of the account. thunderbird uses email id as default, but you can change that at the account settings pane. Just highlight account, rightclick and select settings, and on next pane where it says 'Account name', overtype with any descriptive text that you want to appear on main screen. OR, if you want the name of account to remain the email address, just put mouse on the vertical bar at the right and drag farther to the right so the full name shows.
creator: davidsk

content: Are you referring to the Allmail folder? If so, it is just a duplicate of messages in other folders and not generally needed. Maintaining it slows Thunderbird, increases disc space, and often causes confusion. BUT, if you want it, you can normally highlight the account, rightclick and select 'subscribe' and put a tick mark on the AllMail folder. And maybe I misunderstood your issue... Please share more info.
creator: davidsk

content:
I feel, i could not explain my problem. As a beginer, I used thrunderbird with my gmail account details. Now, I did not pay attention and option "Delete Gmail's copy" in POP Downloading setting was marked. Now I do not see any email in GMAIL in browser as all are deleted but all old emails are available in thunderbird.

Can I get those old email from thunderbird to gmail server back ?
creator: hanangul12

content: What you experienced is normal for POP accounts. Mail is downloaded to computer and deleted from server. Let us know what you were wanting to do, and maybe we can give advice on how to achieve that for future messages and that may help in explaining how to put old messages back on server.
creator: davidsk

content: This is sometimes fixed by highlighting folder, right click to select properties and then click the repair button.

creator: STUDIONOVAZZI

content:
Quanto spazio libero hai sull'hard disk? E quanto spazio hai ancora disponibile sull'account di Tiscali? Se usi un antivirus, controlla il suo LOG e verifica che non abbia alterato i file di Thunderbird rilevando virus in uno o più allegati.

Se l'antivirus non ha registrato nulla, prova a lanciare Thunderbird i modalità risoluzione dei problemi -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/modalita-risoluzione-problemi-thunderbird

Se usi una VPN, assicurati che Thunderbird sia escluso dalla sua azione o disattivala quando scarichi la posta.

Se il problema persiste, fai un backup del profilo di Thunderbird -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo

poi metti thunderbird offline (tasto menu > File > Non in linea > Lavora non in linea) ed esegui queste 3 operazioni nell'ordine

  1. Ripara le cartelle dell'account Tiscali e le cartelle di Cartelle locali -> https://www.lifewire.com/repair-folders-thunderbird-1173102
  2. Compatta le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Rigenera l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale

Alla fine di ogni passo, chiudi e riavvia Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content: Please share more information, as the feature does work. Remember, the recipient may choose to ignore it and the recipient's email provider may also choose to ignore it. Requesting a return receipt is not related to global settings. You can request a return receipt from the Options menu when the global settings is turned off.
creator: davidsk
